file-backup.description: Create secure backups of critical client data

file-repair.description: Repair corrupted files on client systems

combined-tasks.description: Perform multiple maintenance tasks on client systems

data-extraction.description: Extract and secure specific data from compromised systems

briefings: {client} needs their {fileType} backed up immediately. Their IT department is overwhelmed and they've contracted us to handle it. Connect to {server} and copy the required files to your local storage.
Urgent request from {client}: They're migrating to a new system and need their current {fileType} preserved. Access {server} and secure copies of all specified files.
{client} is preparing for an audit and needs redundant copies of their {fileType}. Navigate to {server} and back up the files listed below.
Standard backup contract for {client}. Their {fileType} needs to be copied from {server} to ensure business continuity. Time-sensitive - complete before the deadline.
successMessages: Excellent work. {client} confirms all files were received intact. Payment has been processed.
Backup verified by {client}'s IT team. Job complete, credits transferred.
{client} is impressed with the quick turnaround. Full payment released.
failureMessages: {client} reports the backup is incomplete or corrupted. Contract terminated.
Mission timeout. {client} had to bring in another contractor. Penalty applied.
Failed to deliver required files to {client}. Reputation impact noted.

briefings: {client} has discovered {corruptionType} in their critical systems at {server}. They need immediate repair of the affected files. Use your file repair tools to fix the damage.
Emergency repair request: {client} is experiencing {corruptionType} on {server}. Several {fileType} are affected and need professional recovery.
{client}'s systems suffered {corruptionType} during a power fluctuation. Connect to {server} and repair the damaged {fileType} before they lose more data.
Contract from {client}: Their {server} has files showing {corruptionType}. Standard repair job - fix all corrupted files listed below.
successMessages: All files repaired successfully. {client} confirms systems are operational. Payment released.
{client}'s IT team verified the repairs. Excellent work - credits transferred.
File integrity restored for {client}. Contract complete, payment processed.
failureMessages: Repair attempt failed. {client} reports files are still corrupted or further damaged.
Mission timeout. {client}'s data remains compromised. Contract failed.
Unable to complete repairs for {client}. Another contractor has been assigned.

briefings: {client} accidentally deleted critical {fileType} from {server}. They need these files restored from their backup archives immediately.
Data loss incident at {client}: An employee error wiped their {fileType}. Access {server} and restore the files from backup.
{client} is recovering from a system crash. They need {fileType} restored to {server} from archived copies. Time is critical.
Restoration contract for {client}: Their {server} lost several {fileType} during maintenance. Retrieve and restore the archived copies.
successMessages: Files restored successfully. {client} confirms all data is back online. Payment released.
{client}'s systems are fully operational again. Great work - credits transferred.
Restoration complete. {client} is relieved to have their {fileType} back.
failureMessages: Restoration incomplete. {client} is still missing critical files.
Mission timeout. {client}'s data remains lost. Contract terminated.
Failed to restore required files for {client}. Backup archives may have been corrupted.

briefings: {client} needs comprehensive system maintenance on {server}. This includes backing up current {fileType}, repairing corrupted files, and verifying data integrity.
Full maintenance contract from {client}: Their {server} requires backup of critical files, repair of damaged data ({corruptionType}), and system verification.
{client} is preparing for a major system upgrade. They need their {server} fully serviced - backup all {fileType}, repair any corruption, and ensure everything is stable.
Priority contract: {client}'s {server} needs immediate attention. Multiple {fileType} require backup and repair due to {corruptionType}.
successMessages: Comprehensive maintenance complete. {client} reports all systems nominal. Full payment released.
All tasks completed successfully. {client}'s IT team is impressed with the thorough work.
{client} confirms backup and repair operations successful. Contract fulfilled, bonus included.
failureMessages: Maintenance incomplete. {client} reports outstanding issues with their systems.
Mission timeout. {client}'s systems still require attention. Contract failed.
Failed to complete all required tasks for {client}. Partial penalty applied.

briefings: {client} suspects their {server} may be compromised. They need specific {fileType} extracted and secured before potential data loss.
Urgent extraction request from {client}: Their {server} is showing signs of {corruptionType}. Pull the critical {fileType} before the situation worsens.
{client} is shutting down a legacy system at {server}. They need {fileType} extracted and preserved for compliance purposes.
Time-sensitive contract: {client} needs {fileType} extracted from {server}. The system is scheduled for decommission - get the data out now.
successMessages: Data extraction complete. {client} confirms all critical files secured. Payment processed.
Files successfully extracted from {server}. {client} is satisfied with the quick response.
Extraction verified. {client}'s data is safe. Contract complete.
failureMessages: Extraction failed. {client} reports critical data was not recovered.
Mission timeout. {client}'s data may be lost permanently.
Unable to extract required files for {client}. System access may have been compromised.

escalation.name: Escalating Crisis
escalation.description: Initial problem reveals deeper issues requiring follow-up work

parts.briefingModifier: Initial assessment reveals some {corruptionType}. Start with these repairs.
parts.transitionMessage: Hold on - our scans show the corruption is more extensive than initially thought. We need you to continue.

parts.briefingModifier: Before we proceed with deeper repairs, we need backups of all remaining good data.
parts.transitionMessage: Good work on the backups. Now we can proceed to the final restoration phase.

parts.briefingModifier: Final phase: restore the repaired and backed-up data to bring systems back online.
Standard backup operation. Should be straightforward.
parts.transitionMessage: During the backup, we discovered some corrupted files that need attention before we can continue.

parts.briefingModifier: The backup revealed underlying {corruptionType}. Fix these before the client notices.
Phase 1: Extract all critical data from the legacy system.
parts.transitionMessage: Extraction complete. Moving to data validation phase.

parts.briefingModifier: Phase 2: Some extracted files have compatibility issues. Repair them for the new system.
parts.transitionMessage: Files repaired. Final phase: load the data into the new environment.

parts.briefingModifier: Phase 3: Restore all migrated data to the new system and verify integrity.
Audit preparation: Create compliant backups of all required {fileType}.
parts.transitionMessage: Backups complete, but auditors flagged some data integrity issues.

parts.briefingModifier: Fix the flagged files before the auditors return. {corruptionType} must be resolved.

additionalFiles.triggerMessage: Good progress so far. {client} has identified additional files that need attention. They're offering {bonusAmount} extra to include these in the current contract.
additionalFiles.acceptMessage: Extension accepted. Additional files have been added to your objectives.
additionalFiles.declineMessage: Understood. Focus on completing the original contract.

urgentAddition.triggerMessage: URGENT: {client} just discovered more critical {fileType} affected by {corruptionType}. They're willing to pay {bonusAmount} extra for immediate inclusion.
urgentAddition.acceptMessage: Extension accepted. Prioritize these additional files.
urgentAddition.declineMessage: Extension declined. Complete the original scope only.

scopeExpansion.triggerMessage: {client} is impressed with your work so far. They'd like to expand the scope to include additional systems. Bonus of {bonusAmount} for the extra work.
scopeExpansion.acceptMessage: Scope expanded. New objectives added to the mission.
scopeExpansion.declineMessage: Staying with original scope. Complete current objectives.
